title: Fans Pack Bars as U.S.-Canada Hockey Game Puts Rivalry on the Line
summary_full: Canadians and Americans jammed bars that opened early on Sunday to watch the United States deal the Canadian team, and the country, a devastating blow in overtime.
summary_public: Canadians and Americans jammed bars that opened early on Sunday to watch the United States deal the Canadian team, and the country, a devastating blow in overtime.
